channel.title: [SRL][RS2] Shock's Bow Stringer [RS2][SRL]
channel.description:
Hi i am releasing my auto bow stringer :D it works well but has no anti randoms. i had it running on a dummy account with 3k bow strings and 3k bow(u)'s over knight. i checked on it in the moarning(approx. 9 hours but it had been done way before that) and all the bow strings were on the bows!! this script has auto color.
[code] \/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\ /\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/ \/\/\/\/\/ Shock's Bow stringer /\/\/\/\/\ /\/\/\/\/\ \/\/\/\/\/ \/\/\/\/\/ 1. Make shure your user is near a bank booth /\/\/\/\/\ /\/\/\/\/\ 2. Make shure your bow strings are in first bank slot /\/\/\/\/\ \/\/\/\/\/ 3. Make shure your bow (u)'s are in second bank slot /\/\/\/\/\ /\/\/\/\/\ 4. set up the 'user setup' part starting on line 54 \/\/\/\/\/ \/\/\/\/\/ 5. make shure you are logged out and hit play /\/\/\/\/\ /\/\/\/\/\ \/\/\/\/\/ \/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\ /\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/ \/\/\/\/\/ Usage: /\/\/\/\/\ /\/\/\/\/\ Takes bow strings and bow(u)'s out of your bank, \/\/\/\/\/ \/\/\/\/\/ puts them together, and then deposits them back /\/\/\/\/\ /\/\/\/\/\ in your bank. \/\/\/\/\/ \/\/\/\/\/ /\/\/\/\/\ /\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/ \/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\ [/code]
you can down-load it from the link below: http://mxb.dk/upload/bow_stringer_shock.scar
please test it. please post errors.
remember this is only v.1 so it is expected to be buggy.
engoy! :D
v.2 will have anti randoms, progress reports, multipull accuouts and random log in/logout procedures.

You use clickmouse functions which are easily detectable. Use Mmouse or even find/click bitmaps.

item.title: [SRL][RS2] Shock's Bow Stringer [RS2][SRL]
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

[quote="-shock-, post:7, topic:42521"]any script does that if your computer/internet is slow… it is srl…[br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 02:04:23 PM[/size][hr]Hey starblaster100, if you would of read that those posts were posted over a course of 3 days (72+ hrs) you would have discovered that i did not double/triple post. please can somebody remove that warning… i did not diserve it! double and/or triple posts happen over a course of three or four minuits… just because there was three posts there doesnt mean that i did it quickily, there fore i do not diserve that warning! i am not trying to be rude ;D but it was a wrong disigion. please , look over the posts discover that you made a mistake, and fix it. or somebody with mod/admin priviliges fix it. i did dot do anything wrong. please, i do not want anyone in this comunity to think any less of me.[/quote]That’s considered a double/triple post… and you just double posted there too…

Read full topic

item.title: [SRL][RS2] Shock's Bow Stringer [RS2][SRL]
item.dc:creator: @shock -shock-
item.description:
@shock wrote:

Hi i am releasing my auto bow stringer it works well but has no anti randoms.
i had it running on a dummy account with 3k bow strings and 3k bow(u)'s over knight. i checked on it in the moarning(approx. 9 hours but it had been done way before that) and all the bow strings were on the bows!!
this script has auto color.

\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\
/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/
\/\/\/\/\/                      Shock's Bow stringer                 /\/\/\/\/\
/\/\/\/\/\                                                           \/\/\/\/\/
\/\/\/\/\/     1. Make shure your user is near a bank booth          /\/\/\/\/\
/\/\/\/\/\     2. Make shure your bow strings are in first bank slot /\/\/\/\/\
\/\/\/\/\/     3. Make shure your bow (u)'s are in second bank slot  /\/\/\/\/\
/\/\/\/\/\     4. set up the 'user setup' part starting on line 54   \/\/\/\/\/
\/\/\/\/\/     5. make shure you are logged out and hit play         /\/\/\/\/\
/\/\/\/\/\                                                           \/\/\/\/\/
\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\
/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/
\/\/\/\/\/                           Usage:                          /\/\/\/\/\
/\/\/\/\/\       Takes bow strings and bow(u)'s out of your bank,    \/\/\/\/\/
\/\/\/\/\/       puts them together, and then deposits them back     /\/\/\/\/\
/\/\/\/\/\       in your bank.                                       \/\/\/\/\/
\/\/\/\/\/                                                           /\/\/\/\/\
/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/
\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\

you can down-load it from the link below:
http://mxb.dk/upload/bow_stringer_shock.scar

please test it.
please post errors.

remember this is only v.1 so it is expected to be buggy.

engoy!

v.2 will have anti randoms, progress reports, multipull accuouts and random log in/logout procedures.

Read full topic
